    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>


    </div>
</div>

    $(function() {
        var tabsmenu = new TabsMenu({
            tabscontainer: $("#flightCriteria #tabs-container"),
            boxes: $("#flightCriteria div.criteriaBox")
        });
        tabsmenu.init();
        $("#flightCriteria").show();
    }); 
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            setTimeout(function() {

                var hotelFlightSettings = {
                    controls: {
                        flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),
                        criteriaSelect: $("#hotel-flightbox .criteriaSelect"),
                        OneWay: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfOneWayWrapper"),
                        Roundtrip: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfRoundtripWrapper"),
                        OneWayRadio: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfOneWay"),
                        RoundtripRadio: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfRoundtrip"),
                        departureCity: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfdepartureCity"),
                        arrivalCity: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfarrivalCity"),
                        arrivalCityDropDown: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfarrivalCityDrop"),
                        flightCriteriaReturndateWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #flightCriteria-hf-returndate-wrapper"),
                        DepartureDateLabel: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfDepartureDateLabel"),
                        departureDateField: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfDepartureDate"),
                        returnDateField: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfReturnDate"),
                        ReturnDateLabel: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfReturnDateLabel"),
                        hfDepartureCityDescription: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfDepartureCityDescription"),
                        hfArrivalCityDescription: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfArrivalCityDescription"),
                        clearReturnDate: $(".dateWrapper i.clear"),
                        fromAirportWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #hffromAirportWrapper"),
                        toAirportWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #hftoAirportWrapper"),

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

                t.c = {

                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },

                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),

                        month: t.container.find('.month'),

                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });

                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

            criteria.init();

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>


    </div>

    $(function() {
        var tabsmenu = new TabsMenu({
            tabscontainer: $("#flightCriteria #tabs-container"),
            boxes: $("#flightCriteria div.criteriaBox")
        });
        tabsmenu.init();
        $("#flightCriteria").show();
    });

    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    try {
                        //github.com/KevinBatdorf/liquidslider
                        $('#banner-part-667').liquidSlider({
                            slideEaseDuration: 1000,
                            autoSlide: true,
                            autoSlideInterval: 7000,
                            mobileNavigation: false,
                            dynamicTabs: false,
                            pauseOnHover: true

                        });

                        $('#banner-part-667').show();
                        ShowThis($("#banner-slider-667-wrapper"), "True", "True", "False");

        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),

                };

                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    try {
                        //github.com/KevinBatdorf/liquidslider
                        $('#banner-part-667').liquidSlider({
                            slideEaseDuration: 1000,
                            autoSlide: true,
                            autoSlideInterval: 7000,
                            mobileNavigation: false,
                            dynamicTabs: false,
                            pauseOnHover: true

                        });

                        $('#banner-part-667').show();
                        ShowThis($("#banner-slider-667-wrapper"), "True", "True", "False");

                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error when loading banners exception:" + e);
                    } 
                });

                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

                    <div class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
                        <div class="inline" data-bind="visible: selectedAdults">
                            <span class="text" data-bind="text: getTotalPassengers"></span>
                            <span class="text" data-bind="text: getPassengersLabel"></span>
                        </div>
                        &nbsp;
                        <span class="description inline">Salida: </span>
                        <span class="text" data-bind="text: getShortDepartureDate"></span>

                        <div class="inline" data-bind="visible: returnDate && showMinifiedReturn()">
                            <span class="description">Regreso:</span>
                            <span class="text" data-bind="text: getShortReturnDate"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <a id="aChangeSearch" class="button-main">Nueva B&#250;squeda</a>
                    <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
            </div>

        </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

                        d();
                    }
                });

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',

                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });

            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;

            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;

        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            var lastBookingDate = null;
                    
            lastBookingDate = new Date(2017, 3 - 1, 31);
            

            ;

            var criteria = new FlightCriteria({
                controls: {
                    flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),
                    minifiedFlightCriteria: $('#flightCriteriaMinified'),
                    boxFlight: $("#box-flight"),
                    tabsContainer: $("#tabs-container"),
                    criteriaSelect: $("#box-flight .criteriaSelect"),
                    OneWay: $("#box-flight #rbOneWayWrapper"),
                    PromoInput: $("#box-flight #PromoCode"),
                    Roundtrip: $("#box-flight #rbRoundtripWrapper"),
                    OneWayRadio: $("#box-flight #rbOneWay"),
                    RoundtripRadio: $("#box-flight #rbRoundtrip"),
                    flightCriteriaReturndateWrapper: $("#flightCriteria-returndate-wrapper"),
                    ReturnDateLabel: $("#box-flight #ReturnDateLabel"),
                    departureCity: $("#box-flight #departureCity"),
                    arrivalCity: $("#box-flight #arrivalCity"),
                    arrivalCityDropDown: $("#box-flight #arrivalCityDrop"),
                    departureCityDropDown: $("#box-flight #departureCityDrop"),
                    changeSearch: $("#aChangeSearch"),
                    flightCriteriaPremium: $("#box-flight #flightCriteriaPremium"),
                    departureDateField: $("#box-flight #DepartureDate"),
                    departureDateFieldForDisplay: $("#box-flight #DepartureDateForDisplay"),
                    returnDateField: $("#box-flight #ReturnDate"),
                    returnDateFieldForDisplay: $("#box-flight #ReturnDateForDisplay"),
                    form: $("#box-flight-form"),
                    fromAirportWrapper: $("#box-flight #fromAirportWrapper"),
                    toAirportWrapper: $("#box-flight #toAirportWrapper"),
                    adultsChildrenWrapper: $("#box-flight #adultsChildrenWrapper"),
                    infantsWrapper: $("#box-flight #infantsWrapper"),
                    validationErrorsContainer: $("#box-flight #validationErrors"),
                    continueLink: $("#box-flight #continueLinkFlight"),
                    continueButton: $("#box-flight #btnContinue"),
                    amexCard: $("#box-flight #AmexCardNumber"),
                    Adults: $("#box-flight .selectAdults"),
                    children: $("#box-flight .selectChildren"),
                    Infants: $("#box-flight .selectInfants"),
                    loginFailDialog: $("#box-flight #loginFailure"),
                    loginFailHtml: $("#box-flight #loginFailureErrorMessage"),
                    currencyMxn: $("#box-flight #currencyMXN"),
                    currencyUsd: $("#box-flight #currencyUSD"),
                    popup: {
                        innerLinksWrap: $(".destination-div .white-box"),
                        openPopupLinks: $("#toAirportWrapper .label, #fromAirportWrapper .label")
                    }
                },
                translations: {
                    adultLabel: 'Adulto',
                    adultsLabel: 'Adultos',
                    childLabel: 'Ni&#241;o',
                    childrenLabel: 'Ni&#241;os',
                    childrenDescription: 'Menores de 14 a&#241;os',
                    infantLabel: 'Infante',
                    infantsLabel: 'Infantes',
                    infantsDescription: 'Menores de 2 a&#241;os',
                    guestLabel: 'Pasajero',
                    guestsLabel: 'Pasajeros',
                    oneWay: 'Sencillo',
                    oneWayTooltip: 'Clic aqu&#237; para quitar el vuelo de regreso',
                    validationErrorMessage: '* Por favor llena los campos requeridos',
                    returnDateEarlierThanDepartureDate: '(La fecha de regreso debe ser mayor a la fecha de salida)',
                    searchButtonLoading: 'Buscando',
                    searchButton: 'Buscar',
                    onlyOneInfantPerAdultAllowed: 'Hasta un infante por adulto'
                },
                LastBookingDate: lastBookingDate,

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                    <style type="text/css">.va {
	text-align: justify;
}
</style>
<h2 style="margin: 0;font-size:18px;">WEB CHECK-IN</h2>
<span class="va">Ahora puedes documentar en l&iacute;nea en cualquier momento, l leves o no equipaje. Puedes hacerlo desde la comodidad de tu hogar u oficina desde 72 horas y hasta 4 horas antes de la salida de tu vuelo. </span>
                </div>
            </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Submit Tracking Click -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            setTimeout(function() {

                var hotelFlightSettings = {
                    controls: {
                        flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),
                        criteriaSelect: $("#hotel-flightbox .criteriaSelect"),
                        OneWay: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfOneWayWrapper"),
                        Roundtrip: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfRoundtripWrapper"),
                        OneWayRadio: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfOneWay"),
                        RoundtripRadio: $("#hotel-flightbox #rbhfRoundtrip"),
                        departureCity: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfdepartureCity"),
                        arrivalCity: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfarrivalCity"),
                        arrivalCityDropDown: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfarrivalCityDrop"),
                        flightCriteriaReturndateWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #flightCriteria-hf-returndate-wrapper"),
                        DepartureDateLabel: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfDepartureDateLabel"),
                        departureDateField: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfDepartureDate"),
                        returnDateField: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfReturnDate"),
                        ReturnDateLabel: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfReturnDateLabel"),
                        hfDepartureCityDescription: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfDepartureCityDescription"),
                        hfArrivalCityDescription: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfArrivalCityDescription"),
                        clearReturnDate: $(".dateWrapper i.clear"),
                        fromAirportWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #hffromAirportWrapper"),
                        toAirportWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #hftoAirportWrapper"),
                        hfRoomsWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox #hfRoomsWrapper"),
                        hfAdultsChildrenWrapper: $("#hotel-flightbox .hfAdultsChildrenWrapper"),
                        continueLink: $("#hotel-flightbox #continueLinkFlightHotel"),
                        continueButton: $("#hotel-flightbox #btnContinueFlightHotel"),
                        Adults: $("#hotel-flightbox .selectAdults"),
                        searchLinkText: $("#search-link-text"),
                        form: $("#box-hotel-flight-form"),
                        departureDateIcon: $("#hotel-flightbox .dateIcon.departure"),
                        returnDateIcon: $("#hotel-flightbox .dateIcon.return"),
                    },
                    translations: {
                        adultLabel: 'Adulto',
                        adultsLabel: 'Adultos',
                        childLabel: 'Ni&#241;o',
                        childrenLabel: 'Ni&#241;os',
                        childrenDescription: 'Menor de 14 a&#241;os',

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            var lastBookingDate = null;
                    
            lastBookingDate = new Date(2017, 3 - 1, 31);
            

            ;

            var criteria = new FlightCriteria({
                controls: {
                    flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),
                    minifiedFlightCriteria: $('#flightCriteriaMinified'),
                    boxFlight: $("#box-flight"),
                    tabsContainer: $("#tabs-container"),
                    criteriaSelect: $("#box-flight .criteriaSelect"),
                    OneWay: $("#box-flight #rbOneWayWrapper"),
                    PromoInput: $("#box-flight #PromoCode"),
                    Roundtrip: $("#box-flight #rbRoundtripWrapper"),
                    OneWayRadio: $("#box-flight #rbOneWay"),
                    RoundtripRadio: $("#box-flight #rbRoundtrip"),
                    flightCriteriaReturndateWrapper: $("#flightCriteria-returndate-wrapper"),
                    ReturnDateLabel: $("#box-flight #ReturnDateLabel"),
                    departureCity: $("#box-flight #departureCity"),
                    arrivalCity: $("#box-flight #arrivalCity"),
                    arrivalCityDropDown: $("#box-flight #arrivalCityDrop"),
                    departureCityDropDown: $("#box-flight #departureCityDrop"),
                    changeSearch: $("#aChangeSearch"),
                    flightCriteriaPremium: $("#box-flight #flightCriteriaPremium"),
                    departureDateField: $("#box-flight #DepartureDate"),
                    departureDateFieldForDisplay: $("#box-flight #DepartureDateForDisplay"),
                    returnDateField: $("#box-flight #ReturnDate"),
                    returnDateFieldForDisplay: $("#box-flight #ReturnDateForDisplay"),
                    form: $("#box-flight-form"),
                    fromAirportWrapper: $("#box-flight #fromAirportWrapper"),
                    toAirportWrapper: $("#box-flight #toAirportWrapper"),
                    adultsChildrenWrapper: $("#box-flight #adultsChildrenWrapper"),
                    infantsWrapper: $("#box-flight #infantsWrapper"),
                    validationErrorsContainer: $("#box-flight #validationErrors"),
                    continueLink: $("#box-flight #continueLinkFlight"),
                    continueButton: $("#box-flight #btnContinue"),
                    amexCard: $("#box-flight #AmexCardNumber"),
                    Adults: $("#box-flight .selectAdults"),
                    children: $("#box-flight .selectChildren"),
                    Infants: $("#box-flight .selectInfants"),
                    loginFailDialog: $("#box-flight #loginFailure"),

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Submit Tracking Click -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    ezy.shared.listrak().init({

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>
