        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    try {
                        //github.com/KevinBatdorf/liquidslider
                        $('#banner-part-680').liquidSlider({
                            slideEaseDuration: 1000,
                            autoSlide: true,
                            autoSlideInterval: 7000,
                            mobileNavigation: false,
                            dynamicTabs: false,
                            pauseOnHover: true

                        });

                        $('#banner-part-680').show();
                        ShowThis($("#banner-slider-680-wrapper"), "True", "True", "False");

                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error when loading banners exception:" + e);
                    } 
                });

    }

</style>

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            var lastBookingDate = null;
                    
            lastBookingDate = new Date(2017, 3 - 1, 31);
            

            ;

            var criteria = new FlightCriteria({
                controls: {
                    flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),

                <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-4 inner-row">
                    <a class="button-main next booking-login-link" href="#">Buscar<i></i></a>
                    <input type="submit" class="booking-login-button" value="Buscar"/>
                </div>
            <div class="clear"></div>
        </div>       
    </form>


    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Submit Tracking Click -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    ezy.shared.listrak().init({

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    try {
                        //github.com/KevinBatdorf/liquidslider
                        $('#banner-part-680').liquidSlider({
                            slideEaseDuration: 1000,
                            autoSlide: true,
                            autoSlideInterval: 7000,
                            mobileNavigation: false,
                            dynamicTabs: false,
                            pauseOnHover: true

                        });

                        $('#banner-part-680').show();
                        ShowThis($("#banner-slider-680-wrapper"), "True", "True", "False");

                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error when loading banners exception:" + e);
                    } 
                });

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            var lastBookingDate = null;
                    
            lastBookingDate = new Date(2017, 3 - 1, 31);
            

            ;

            var criteria = new FlightCriteria({
                controls: {
                    flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),

                <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-4 inner-row">

                    <input type="submit" class="booking-login-button" value="Buscar"/>
                </div>
            <div class="clear"></div>
        </div>       
    </form>


    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },

                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Submit Tracking Click -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    ezy.shared.listrak().init({

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='webcheckin']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Por favor espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },
                    controls: {
                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='webcheckin']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='webcheckin']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });
    </script>
        </div>

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    try {
                        //github.com/KevinBatdorf/liquidslider
                        $('#banner-part-680').liquidSlider({
                            slideEaseDuration: 1000,
                            autoSlide: true,
                            autoSlideInterval: 7000,
                            mobileNavigation: false,
                            dynamicTabs: false,
                            pauseOnHover: true

                        });

                        $('#banner-part-680').show();
                        ShowThis($("#banner-slider-680-wrapper"), "True", "True", "False");

                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log("Error when loading banners exception:" + e);
                    } 
                });

    }

        var languageCode = 'mx';

        // fix for browsers without console defined (IE8)
        var console = console || { "log": function () { }, "error": function () { } };

        function trackOutboundLink(link, category, action) {

            try {
                ga('send', 'event', {
                    eventCategory: category,
                    eventAction: action
                });
            } catch (err) { }

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (link.target == "_blank") {
                    window.open(link.href, '_blank');
                } else {
                    document.location.href = link.href;
                }
            }, 100);
        }


    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function() {

            var lastBookingDate = null;
                    
            lastBookingDate = new Date(2017, 3 - 1, 31);
            

            ;

            var criteria = new FlightCriteria({
                controls: {
                    flightCriteria: $('#flightCriteria'),

                <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-4 inner-row">

                    <input type="submit" class="booking-login-button" value="Buscar"/>
                </div>

        </div>       
    </form>


    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function() {
            setTimeout(function() {
                var t = this;
                t.container = $("div.criteriaBox[data-tab-id='myflight']");

                t.c = {
                    translations: {
                        locatorRequired: 'La clave de reserva es requerida',
                        lastNameRequired: 'El apellido es requerido',
                        btnPleaseWait: 'Espere un momento...',
                        btnLoginText: 'Buscar',
                        locatorDisallowedCharacters: 'La clave de reserva tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar',
                        lastnameDisallowedCharacters: 'El apellido tiene caracteres inv&#225;lidos, favor de verificar'
                    },

                        loginLink: t.container.find('.booking-login-link'),
                        loginBtn: t.container.find('.booking-login-button'),
                        year: t.container.find('.year'),
                        month: t.container.find('.month'),
                        day: t.container.find('.day'),
                        bookingLoginValidation: ".booking-login-validation[data-tab-id='myflight']"
                    },
                    form: $("form[data-tab-id='myflight']")
                };

                t.myflightLogin = ezy.views.myflight.login(t.c);
                t.myflightLogin.init();

            }, 100);


        });

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Submit Tracking Click -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(d) {
            if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('ltkAsyncListener', d);
            else {
                e = document.documentElement;
                e.ltkAsyncProperty = 0;
                e.attachEvent('onpropertychange', function(e) {
                    if (e.propertyName == 'ltkAsyncProperty') {
                        d();
                    }
                });
            }
        })(function() {
            _ltk.Click.Submit();
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Listrak Analytics - Script Source -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var biJsHost = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
        (function(d, s, id, tid, vid) {
            var js, ljs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
            if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
            js = d.createElement(s);
            js.id = id;
            js.src = biJsHost + "cdn.listrakbi.com/scripts/script.js?m=" + tid + "&v=" + vid;
            ljs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, ljs);
        })(document, 'script', 'ltkSDK', '2flEXlE1JzSd', '1');
    </script>

    ezy.shared.listrak().init({
        enabled: true
    });

    window.ezy.availabilitySettings = {

        $(".siteWrapper").addClass("mobile-device");
